title: WTB: T206 SGC 50 or SGC 60 cards

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 SGC 50 or SGC 60 cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: rob
Hi all,

I have about $400 in my paypal account and am looking for SGC 50/60 cards I need for my set. I am willing to pay:

SGC 50 - $45
SGC 60 - $85-$90

If you have any available at these prices, please shoot me a list. I wll consider premium/HOF cards if you send me a price.

I am NOT interested in any PSA cards, so no need to send me any of them.

thanks - Rob
